MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers on site to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 6:20PM in the LL53 postcode areas of Pwllheli, due to a grounded overhead cable. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely  and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 8:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:40PM on 29th March 2021
